cache.atLeastOneAdapter: At least one cache adapter is required

sessionStorage.unavailable: sessionStorage is not available; use in a browser environment

localStorage.unavailable: localStorage is not available; use in a browser environment

indexedDb.unavailable: IndexedDB is not available; use in a browser environment
indexedDb.deleteByTagsFailed: Failed to delete cache by tags: {message}

redis.needConfig: RedisAdapter requires connection config or client instance
redis.notConnected: Redis client is not connected; call connect() first

memcached.notConnected: Memcached client is not connected; call connect() first
